main event: A silver, cigar-shaped unidentified object was observed over the Azores on September 26, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as stationary and lighted irregularly., Witnesses noted the object emitted a bright light and had a metallic appearance., It was reported that the object seemed to slow down as it passed over them but vanished suddenly., Observers were traveling west and noticed the object upon turning a corner., The sighting lasted approximately 8 minutes during which distinct green lights were observed.
sighted object: 1 silver, cigar-shaped object and two distinct green lights
witness description: Male, age 64, detailed observations and sketches of the sighted object.
